title: YouTube tests new immersive autoplay mode on mobile home feed
content:
The latest UI test for YouTube on mobile makes yet more adjustments to the autoplay “Playback in feed” feature to make this more immersive.

more…

The post YouTube tests new immersive autoplay mode on mobile home feed appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: YouTube on mobile is testing more adjustments to the autoplay "Playback in feed" feature to make this more immersive.
